title: True Love Story Summer Days, and yet...

tmdb.name: True Love Story Summer Days, and yet...
tmdb.original_name: True Love Story Summer Days, and yet...
tmdb.overview: After his mother's death Yuuta Morisaki and his older sister Ruri move into the city. In a school corridor, Yuuta bumps into the cute yet slightly klutzy Hina Kusunose, a member of the tennis club. Hina remembers their shared past. Slowly Yuuta starts to remember the childhood promise he made to the girl with whom he used to play when his mother was still alive.

title: はじめの一歩 間柴vs木村 死刑執行

tmdb.title: 第一神拳 间柴vs木村 死刑执行
tmdb.original_title: はじめの一歩 : 間柴vs木村 / はじめの一歩 THE FIGHTING! 木村達也vs間柴了
tmdb.overview: 家中经营钓鱼船，总是被欺负的少年幕之内一歩和后来成为世界冠军的鹰村守相遇，开启了拳击的人生。
